catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 249
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: unsigned; 3/4 profile of woman using both hands to place a comb in her hair; bright, boldly colored clothing: red and white outer robe with gray-blue flowers and foliage; tan striped inner garment; bold black outlines
provenance: Yamaji Shonosuke (in 1959); Frank E. Hart (until 1963); Mary Burke (1963-2015)
title: Standing Beauty
